water_presence: Sparse; reliant on hidden springs and cacti adaptation.
scale_chunk_description: Each chunk represents a large section of the scrubland, approximately 50ft x 50ft, encompassing multiple shrubs, cacti and micro-terrain features.
scale_tile_description: Each tile within a chunk represents a detailed element of the terrain: a single large cactus, a specific cluster of scrub, a rocky outcrop, or a patch of bare earth.
tone_and_atmosphere: Desolate, fading, with a glimmer of hope.
magic_presence: Low_magic (natural adaptations considered innate abilities, not necessarily supernatural)
